FuncDef: This command configures the VPRN BGP instance to participate in a BGP confederation. BGP confederations can be used to reduce the number of IBGP sessions required within an AS.

ParaDef.Info: The confederation AS number defined as a decimal value. Values-1 to 4294967295.
The AS number(s) that are members of the confederation, each expressed as a decimal integer. Configure up to 15 members per confed-as-num. Values-1 to 4294967295.
